name: INTIMASIA 2023
content: “South Asia’s largest exhibition of intimate wear & active wear” INTIMASIA is the biggest show in the intimate wear market segment bringing brands, manufacturers, suppliers, retailers, and all affiliated businesses under one roof. It is a comprehensive tradeshow on garment and textile machinery. The show is targeted to address the interests of those who wish to reach out to the textile and garment industries in India. Acting as the definitive gateway to provide excellent quality, one-step buying/selling and sourcing platform. The exhibition will showcase products, services and technologies correlated to complete production chain. • Exhibitors showcasing their entire product line in an exclusive event • Retailers, distributors, and agents from across India interacting for sourcing • 100,000 sq. ft. area hosting 3-day exhibition of intimate wear market category • Sea of opportunities to grow your business at exponential rate
